content: cheap non-shiny acrylic is best for beginners i used red heart super saver for my mousey you won t need much * crochet hook of your choice-my choice is a bamboo hook size e * plastic animal eyes the pictured mousey has 9mm eyes * embroidery yarn for the face * darning needle * straight pins * polyfill stuffing lntroduction hopefully you have basic knowledge of how to make up a simple amigurumi lf not l will do my best to keep this simple lf you have any questions or problems please feel free to email me the number in parenthesis is the total number of stitches per row also there are some visuals to help you out if you re lost and some pro-tips at the end do not join between rounds and i always find it helpful to put a safety pin in to mark the beginning of a row these patterns are written to start with the chain 2 method but you can substitute it for the magic loop method i prefer and only use the magic loop but i couldn t explain it to save my life abbreviations chain = chain stitch single_crochet = single_crochet stitch increase = increase 2 single_crochet in same stitch decrease = decrease l single_crochet over two stitches tbl = through back loops creates shaping sl = slip_stitch pull up a loop and through the loop on hook *= repeat everything enclosed in stars the listed number of times after the star hhhheeeeaaaadddd round 1 chain 2 6 single_crochet in second chain from hook round 2 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 12 round 3 *single_crochet 1 increase 1* repeat 5 times 18 round 4 *single_crochet 2 increase 1* repeat 5 times 24 round 5 *single_crochet 3 increase 1* repeat 5 times 30 round 6 *single_crochet 4 increase 1* repeat 5 times 36 round 7-12 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 36 round 13 *single_crochet 4 decrease 1* repeat 5 times 30 insert the eyes where you would like them to be placed but do not put the backs on yet instead sew three little eyelashes on each side so the ends will go under the eye embroider the face i sew a triangle for the nose and fill with satin stitches then i sew a mouth put the backs on the eyes begin stuffing after this row or the opening will be too small to work with round 14 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 30 round 15 *single_crochet 3 decrease 1* repeat 5 times 24 round 16 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 24 round 17 *single_crochet 2 decrease 1* repeat 5 times 18 round 18 *single_crochet 1 decrease 1* repeat 5 times 12 round 19 *decrease every stitch around* repeat 6 times 6 finish off and leave a long tail for sewing i finish off by threading the yarn through the front loops of each stitch in the last row in this case you will have six then you pull the thread
